body_html: When I used feed for input data, no problem occured, now when using tf.data, the input is part of the graph resulting in this problem. Can I somehow save all variables except the input data? Respectively, can we save all trainable variables only?

body: When I used feed for input data, no problem occured, now when using tf.data, the input is part of the graph resulting in this problem. Can I somehow save all variables except the input data? Respectively, can we save all trainable variables only?
